synopsis.text: One life, two chances. Initially, Aoi Takamoto, a brilliant surgeon, was Elise, a malevolent princess who met her end due to her cruel actions and obsessive love for Prince Linden. Reincarnated in the modern era, Aoi vows to atone for her sins by saving lives as a doctor. But fate intervenes, causing a plane crash that results in her untimely death. In an unexpected twist, Aoi finds herself back in Elise's body, ten years before her execution. Determined to change her destiny, she utilizes her medical expertise to heal the sick and help the ailing empire. With only six months to prove her worth to the emperor, Aoi embarks on a journey to redeem herself and break free from her tragic past. Will her resolve and knowledge be enough to alter her fate, or will history repeat itself?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
